org.epochx.ge.op.mutation
Interface GEMutation

All Superinterfaces:
Mutation, Operator
All Known Implementing Classes:
PointMutation, SinglePointMutation
public interface GEMutation
extends Mutation

This interface defines the structure which specific mutation operators can implement to provide different methods of mutating a GECandidateProgram. GPMutation instances are used by the core GRMutation class to perform a single mutation operation.

See Also:
org.epochx.ge.model.GRMutation

Method Summary
 GECandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram program)
          Implementations should perform some form of alteration to the genetic material of the given GECandidateProgram, returning the resultant program.
 

Method Detail

mutate

GECandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram program)
Implementations should perform some form of alteration to the genetic material of the given GECandidateProgram, returning the resultant program.

Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
program - The GECandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GECandidateProgram that was the result of altering the provided GECandidateProgram.
